Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AroundLocation  
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Corpse
    Class representing Corpse that is able to rise as a Zombie
    CraftAction
    Special action that allow player to craft a weapon Author:Tan Sook Mun
    Crop
    is an item that can be sown, harvest and turn into food.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    EatAction
    An action for actors to eat food
    FarmBehaviour
    A class that will check if it is standing new to a bare ground, unriped crop or ripe crop and creates the appropriate action.
    Farmer
    A human actor that is a farmer Author: Tan Sook Mun
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertilizeAction
    An action to fertilize the crops
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    A food to be eaten to gain health points
    GroanAction
    Special action for saying 'Braaaaaains'
    HarvestAction
    Special action for harvesting crops and turning into food Author: Tan Sook Mun
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    SowAction
    A sow action.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieArm
    A class representing ZombieArm and the damage it can do Cast-off Zombie Limbs can be wielded as simple clubs
    ZombieClub
    A weapon crafted by player using a Zombie Arm
    ZombieLeg
    A class representing ZombieLegs Cast-off Zombie Limbs can be wielded as simple clubs
    ZombieMace
    A weapon crafted by player using a Zombie Leg
